game.name: AUTOMOLES
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Recruit moles, collect trinkets, and combine them to epicly eradicate the enemies of Big Doug. Your mole-cenaries will do the fighting; set them up for victory!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Recruit moles, collect trinkets, and combine them to epicly eradicate the enemies of Big Doug. Your mole-cenaries will do the fighting; set them up for victory!
